sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card color="gray" width="100%"  flat outlined >
    <v-virtual-scroll
    :items="Array.from({length: 50}).map((_, index) => index)">
    <v-card width="100%" flat >
                <v-row class="mx-6" no-gutters>
                  <v-card width="240" height="160" flat class="ma-4" v-for="i in 24" :key="i" clipped>
                    <v-img :src="imgs">
                    </v-img>
                    <v-card-title class="text-body-1 pa-0 my-2">{{imgs}}</v-card-title>
                  </v-card>
                </v-row>
              </v-card>
    </v-virtual-scroll>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'GalleryItem',
    data() {
        return {
            imgs: require('../assets/scene00001.png')
        }
    },
}
</script>

<style>
.root{
    overflow-y: scroll;
}
</style>
